QuestData.Title: Cooking With Unstable Herbs
QuestData.Description: The base is boiling and ready for those ingredients.$B$BAdd each of the ingredients, one at a time, and I will handle the mixing and frothing. Speak to me when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Fiona brew a curative elixir.
QuestData.RewardText: Gidwin is looking much better. Thank you, $n.$b$bWe have just enough elixir here to help the others.
